name: Great Al the Game
description:
"Once there was an Allosaurus raised by two humans and his name was Great Al."

Just a silly game about Great Al the Allosaurus and his journey to end his nemesis.

A game originally purposed to roast someone and have been in draft since June 2019. This game is currently released in demo version.

Warning: This game contains strong languange, might contained references to drugs and alcohol, genderswap, and badly edited enemies.
